usernotes-desc: Allows the creation of secure subpages for users to store personal notes about a page
usernotes-create-dialog-label: Enter the new article title exactly as it should appear
usernotes-create-dialog-help: The first letter of article titles must be capitalized. For consistency across the site, we recommend not capitalizing any other words in the title except for proper nouns or abbreviations.
usernotes-create-dialog-existingpublicar: The following public articles exist. To create an article which will be linked to (and accessible from) the public article, click one of the titles below:
No public articles exist which match your title
usernotes-create-dialog-existingusernote: To avoid duplicated content, make sure none of these existing articles in your personal notes already cover the article you wish to write:
No personal notes articles exist which match your title
usernotes-error-mainarticlenotenablednam: Notes are not enabled for namespace "$1"
usernotes-error-mainarticletitleblacklis: Notes are not enabled for title "$1"
usernotes-error-move-fromnamespace: Pages in the UserNotes namespace cannot be moved to another namespace
usernotes-error-move-notsubpage: Subpages in the PracticeGroup namespace can only be moved to other subpages
usernotes-error-move-tonamespace: Pages in other namespaces cannot be moved to the UserNotes namespace
